statements: SELECT * FROM time_series_data;
SELECT id, value FROM time_series_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT timestamp, value FROM time_series_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM time_series_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data WHERE value BETWEEN 10.5 AND 20.7;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM time_series_data WHERE value > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM time_series_data;
SELECT timestamp, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM time_series_data GROUP BY timestamp ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM time_series_data WHERE value < 5;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id > 2 ORDER BY researcher_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT researcher_name, data_value FROM researchers JOIN research_data ON researchers.researcher_id = research_data.researcher_id;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_data_value, COUNT(data_id) AS total_records FROM research_data GROUP BY researcher_id HAVING total_records > 2;
SELECT * FROM researchers
SELECT name, email FROM researchers
SELECT query_text, query_date FROM queries ORDER BY query_date DESC
SELECT * FROM time_series_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, name, email FROM researchers WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT query_text, query_date FROM queries ORDER BY query_date DESC;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM time_series_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT name, email, COUNT(*) AS num_queries FROM researchers JOIN queries ON researchers.id = queries.id GROUP BY name, email ORDER BY num_queries DESC;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data;
SELECT id, researcher_name FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, result FROM analysis_results ORDER BY result DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(id) AS total_results FROM research_projects JOIN analysis_results ON research_projects.id = analysis_results.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data ORDER BY date DESC, value ASC;
SELECT id, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE id > 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT AVG(result) AS average_result FROM analysis_results;
SELECT project_name, AVG(result) AS average_result FROM research_projects rp JOIN analysis_results ar ON rp.id = ar.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData;
SELECT id, date FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE value > 100;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT query_text FROM Queries WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY query_id DESC;
SELECT theme_name FROM ResearchThemes WHERE theme_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT R.researcher_name, Q.query_text FROM Researchers R INNER JOIN Queries Q ON R.researcher_id = Q.researcher_id;
SELECT AR.result_data FROM AnalysisResults AR INNER JOIN Queries Q ON AR.query_id = Q.query_id WHERE Q.query_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ResearchThemes WHERE theme_name = 'Machine Learning';
